03. Projects
Tic-Tac-Toe
A Tic-Tac-Toe Game to play with your friends. build using HTML CSS and vanilla js
Etch-A-Sketch
An online Etch-A-Sketch with high functionality, you can choose between colors, erase. and being able to choose your own grid-size. Built using HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JS.
Calculator
An online calculator with basic arithmetic operations built using HTML5, CSS3 and JS ES6 features. It can be controlled by a mouse or by a keyboard
